thread.title: Small rooms, great location, a pleasant stay.
thread.title_full: Small rooms, great location, a pleasant stay. - Review of Le Relais du Marais, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: bubble212
title: Small rooms, great location, a pleasant stay.
text: The room and elevator were very small, but usually space in Paris is limited. The hotel was very clean and nicely decorated. The staff is english-speaking and really helpful. The location is great as the hotel is situated very close to "republique" and "temple" metro stations and within walking distance to many attractions.
